channel.title: Client Problems, Using windows 7?
channel.description:
Every client i try using just seems to close itself, I log in and just click somewhere and the client just closes down leaving this message in the run.bat box:
[code]Loading The Lost Universe Client Playing Soulja_Boy-_Kiss_me_through_the_phone_wit_lyrics.mp3 loading custom Sprites part 1 loading custom Sprites 2 headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e7786, pid=6012, t id=4392 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Grant\Desktop\SERVER\The Lost Universe Client V3.5\hs_err_pid6012.log
# # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp[/code]
Can anyone help me out please? Its really doing my head in, i'm clueless about what to do to solve it (:
cheers. :cool:

item.title: Client Problems, Using windows 7?
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Love God Of Love
item.description:
@God_Of_Love wrote:

Every client i try using just seems to close itself, I log in and just click somewhere and the client just closes down leaving this message in the run.bat box:

[code]Loading The Lost Universe Client
Playing Soulja_Boy-_Kiss_me_through_the_phone_wit_lyrics.mp3
loading custom Sprites part 1
loading custom Sprites 2
headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded

A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e7786, pid=6012, t

id=4392

JRE version: 6.0_21-b06

Java VM: Java HotSpot™ 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64

)

Problematic frame:

V [jvm.dll+0x57786]

An error report file with more information is saved as:

C:\Users\Grant\Desktop\SERVER\The Lost Universe Client V3.5\hs_err_pid6012.log

If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp[/code]

Can anyone help me out please? Its really doing my head in, i’m clueless about what to do to solve it (:

cheers.
